titles.title: To amend the Omnibus Consolidated Rescissions and Appropriations Act of 1996 to extend the date specified for the transfer of certain amounts to be available for drinking water State revolving funds from August 1, 1996, to September 30, 1996.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 7/25/1996--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Consolidated Rescissions and Appropriations Act of 1996 to postpone from August 1, 1996, to September 30, 1996, the date specified for the transfer of certain amounts to be available for drinking water State revolving funds.
